title: Knock
content:
Knock Level 2 Transmutation Spell Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock. 18m Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Transmutation Spell

Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock.

Knock is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Knock is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Knock Information

Description: Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane
